para: The current online documentation is compatible with GT 4.0.2. For information on changes made for the GT4.1.0-compliant OGSA-DAI WSRF 2.2, there is a single page in the source and binary distributions at <OGSA-DAI>/doc/wsrf/gt4.1.0changes.html which is linked from our index page <OGSA-DAI>/doc/index.html where <OGSA-DAI> is the directory the distribution unpacks into.
